description: I used it in the past to browse the git history. Nowadays I've switched over to gitg long time ago, which offers the same features but also matches the GNOMEs HIG (Human Interface Guidelines). Active development seems to have stopped since 2014.
Bug 741942 - Giggle crashes when opening a new project. Open bug since 2014-12-24. I think the project is dead.
Crashes very often. Sure way to make it crash is to open history and try to view changes in any commits.

It helps me see easily the changes to files. you can both view commit history or browse files individually which is perfect for my use case. I have many files in the project folder and I want to see commit history for each file not the whole project. This is so far the only git client which I found to do that out of the box.

So far, no problems - I was glad to find an app 
for Git that works
stop deliver such nasty soft , it is obviously a shame for a serious entreprise like debian
